Co więcej, film ten wyjaśnia, jak większość pieniędzy, którymi się dziś posługujemy, jest tworzona z powietrza przez banki, gdy kreują one dług. Epicki w zakresie, ten film bada wzorce innowacji technologicznych i kwestionuje wszystko, co myślałeś, że wiesz o pieniądzach. Czy Bitcoin jest alternatywą dla...

programme.title: Światowy Rynek Sztuki
programme.desc: Światowy rynek sztuki jest warty 67,8 miliarda dolarów. To ekosystem skrajności charakteryzujący się głębokimi strukturami władzy, rynek próżności, mitów i hipizmu, znajdujący się w rękach kilku wpływowych graczy. Za błyszczącą fasadą królują nierówność i konkurencja. Industrializacja od lat 90. XX wieku, przyspieszyła handel dziełami sztuki i zglobalizowała zbiorowy gust, ale sam rynek sztuki pozostaje w dużej mierze nieprzejrzysty. Dlaczego? Jak funkcjonuje światowy rynek sztuki? Kto ustala ceny? Jak działają domy aukcyjne i galerie? Dlaczego super bogaci inwestują w sztukę, co tak naprawdę dostają artyści oraz jak Internet wpływa na handel dziełami sztuki? Zespół kanału Moconomy...

programme.title: Token - przyszłość systemu ekonomicznego
programme.desc: Świat finansów podlega ciągłym zmianom. Wraz z postępem cyfryzacji w XXI wieku proces ten gwałtownie przyspieszył i otworzył nowe możliwości myślenia o finansach.

programme.title: Niemieckie dynastie - Thyssenowie
programme.desc: Niemieckie dynastie: Thyssenowie - To mityczne już nazwisko. Kojarzy się nie tylko z ciężkim przemysłem, ale też z wytworną sztuką i niewyobrażalnym bogactwem z nią związanym.

programme.title: Pajęcza Sieć - Drugie Imperium Brytyjskie
programme.desc: Jak Wielka Brytania przekształciła się z największego imperium kolonialnego w nowoczesną potęgę finansową.

programme.title: Marketing Mesjasza
programme.desc: Jak dużo *naprawdę* wiesz o tym, jak zaczęło się chrześcijaństwo? Bez względu na to, czy jesteś chrześcijaninem, ateistą, czy członkiem innego wyznania, nie sposób zignorować wpływu, jaki chrześcijaństwo wywarło na zachodnią cywilizację.

programme.title: Gospodarka Wschodu
programme.desc: Codziennie pojawiają się nowości z Doliny Krzemowej. Wiele naszych technologii pochodzi z "Think Tanks" świata zachodniego. Ale na Wschodzie także pojawiają się innowacje i postęp technologiczny. Czy to podróże kosmiczne w Rosji, czy pionierzy robotyki w Japonii, wszyscy oni próbują zdobyć innowacyjną przewagę konkurencyjną. Wybierz się z nami w podróż po gospodarczym Wschodzie.

programme.title: Chińska Autostrada Handlowa
programme.desc: Dokument w wersji z polskim lektorem. Inicjatywa Pasa i Drogi to sieć handlowa pomiędzy Azją, Europą i Afryką. Ponad 70 krajów jest obecnie częścią tej sieci. Inicjatywa Pasa i Drogi jest uważana za centralny punkt polityki zagranicznej sekretarza generalnego Komunistycznej Partii Chin Xi Jinpinga. Chiński rząd nazywa inicjatywę "próbą poprawy regionalnej łączności i dążenia do lepszej przyszłości." Niektórzy obserwatorzy widzą w niej plan chińskiej dominacji na świecie poprzez skoncentrowaną na Chinach globalną sieć handlową. Projekt ma zostać ukończony do 2049 roku, co zbiega się z setną rocznicą powstania Chińskiej Republiki Ludowej.

programme.title: Ekonomia Południa
programme.desc: Australia, Nowa Zelandia i Chile strasznie słabo radzą sobie z technologią. Przez lata utalentowani programiści tych krajów uciekali do Doliny Krzemowej w USA, by tam zarabiać na życie. Ostatnie programy rządów Australii, Nowej Zelandii i Chile niedofinansowywały nauki i technologii. Istnieją jednak przesłanki by sądzić, że kraje te zaczęły zatrzymywać niektóre z rodzimych talentów technologicznych.

programme.title: Gospodarka Północy
programme.desc: Co mają wspólnego Szwecja, Kanada i Islandia? Zgadza się, są położone wysoko na północy, gdzie panuje śnieg i jest zimno. Ale właśnie ten ekstremalny klimat dał początek całej gamie technologii i innowacyjnych pomysłów, bez których kraje takie jak Islandia i Szwecja nie byłyby konkurencyjne. Wybierz się z nami w podróż po gospodarce Północy.

programme.title: Legendy Internetu
programme.desc: W tym dokumencie opowiadamy historie założycieli największych firm internetowych.

programme.title: Cienie i Blaski Mody
programme.desc: Wielkie nazwiska w modzie wybierają Chińczyków. Przybywają oni tutaj w coraz większej liczbie i mają znaczący wpływ na lokalną gospodarkę. Nasze badania nad Europą i Doliną Mody pokazują, że za kulisami stosuje się każdą sztuczkę, aby zwiększyć zyski - od luk podatkowych po system outsourcingu, w którym produkcja jest zlecana chińskim Włochom pracującym w niedopuszczalnych warunkach. Rozczarowane spojrzenie na wielkie marki.

programme.title: Gospodarka Zachodu
programme.desc: Na zachodzie znajdziemy jednych z największych lub przynajmniej najbardziej ekscentrycznych wynalazców świata. To rzemiosło jest seksowną bestią popychającą maszyny do granic możliwości. Jeśli spojrzeć na pustynię Mojave w USA lub Wielką Brytanię z czasów drugiej wojny światowej, to są to miejsca, które pławią się w inżynierskiej pasji i oferują wolność niestrudzonym majsterkowiczom.

programme.title: Gospodarka w Fazie Przejściowej
programme.desc: Przyszłość jest niepewna i pełna wyzwań. Jak ratować nasze miasta i zwalczać nierówności? Jak poradzimy sobie ze starzejącym się społeczeństwem? Jak poradzić sobie z nierównością płac? Nadszedł czas na myślenie o przyszłości.

programme.title: Gospodarka Jutra
programme.desc: Przyszłość jest niepewna i pełna wyzwań. Jak uratujemy nasze miasta i rozwiążemy problem nierówności? Jak poradzimy sobie z problemem starzejącego się społeczeństwa? Jak zniwelujemy różnice płacowe między płciami? Nadszedł czas zastanowić się nad przyszłością.

programme.title: Mafia, Kokaina i Białe Kołnierzyki
programme.desc: Jest kokaina, tony kokainy, jeden z najbogatszych i najważniejszych szefów Ndranghety w Europie i tak zwana szwajcarska pralka. Ten raport śledzi przepływ brudnych pieniędzy od dealerów w Ameryce Południowej i oferuje niepokojące okno na życie „pracowników umysłowych” w Ticino

programme.title: Największe niemieckie klasy - historia firmy C&A
programme.desc: Wielkie niemieckie klany - historia C&A. Firma ma ponad 456 sklepów. Znajdziemy je w każdym większym niemieckim mieście. Aż 98% Niemców zna tę markę.

programme.title: Aborygeni: mroczny sekret Australii
programme.desc: UTOPIA to film ujawniający, że apartheid jest głęboko zakorzeniony w przeszłości i teraźniejszości Australii, a Aborygeni nadal żyją w skrajnym ubóstwie i warunkach jak w krajach trzeciego świata. Mają niską średnią długością życia i nieproporcjonalnie wysoki wskaźnik zgonów w aresztach policyjnych.

programme.title: Kto Rządzi Ameryką
programme.desc: Polityczny film dokumentalny w wersji z polskim lektorem

programme.title: Kto Rządzi Ameryką Part 2
programme.desc: Spojrzenie na tak zwany demokratyczny system rządzenia w Stanach Zjednoczonych Ameryki, ujawniający rzeczywiste siły, które rządzą narodem.

programme.title: Gorący Pieniądz
programme.desc: Film dokumentalny o finansach w wersji z polskim lektorem

programme.title: Niemieckie dynastie - Thyssenowie
programme.desc: Niemieckie dynastie: Thyssenowie - To mityczne już nazwisko. Kojarzy się nie tylko z ciężkim przemysłem, ale też z wytworną sztuką i niewyobrażalnym bogactwem z nią związanym.

programme.title: Władcy Jena
programme.desc: Rozgrywający się w XX-wiecznej Japonii film dokumentalny bada rolę i potęgę banków centralnych oraz sposób, w jaki można je wykorzystać do zmiany struktur gospodarczych, politycznych i społecznych kraju.

programme.title: Krupp - Mit i prawda
programme.desc: Historia rodziny Kruppów ukazuje dramatyczny rozwój niemieckiego przemysłu i ich prywatnych tragedii. Członkowie rodziny, choć szanowani, często umierali w samotności, poświęcając osobiste szczęście dla interesów firmy. W filmie odkrywane są nieznane fakty, a potomkowie rodziny opowiadają o jej cenie sukcesu i tragedii czterech pokoleń.

programme.title: Bitcoin - Koniec Pieniądza Który Wszyscy Znamy
programme.desc: Bitcoin: Koniec pieniądza, który wszyscy znamy śledzi historię pieniądza od społeczeństw barterowych starożytnego świata do parkietów giełdowych Wall St. Dokument demaskuje praktyki banków centralnych i podejrzanych aktorów finansowych, którzy rzucili świat na kolana w czasie ostatniego kryzysu. programme.title: Niechciani Turyści
programme.desc: Turystyka powoduje wzrost cen i brutalizację sklepów, restauracji i kultury w ogóle. W najczęściej odwiedzanych miastach Europy istnieją dzielnice, z których mieszkańcy są wypychani - turyści mogą płacić czynsze, na które nie stać miejscowych. Jest to szczególnie widoczne w Wenecji i Barcelonie, gdzie ludzie mobilizują się, by domagać się utrzymania turystyki w pewnych granicach.

programme.title: Bitcoin: Poza bańką
programme.desc: Wraz z pojawieniem się Bitcoin, pierwszej na świecie waluty cyfrowej, po raz pierwszy w historii pieniądze nie są już kontrolowane przez banki lub rządy, ale przez ludzi, którzy ich używają.

programme.title: Szwajcaria i krypto rewolucja
programme.desc: Trzymający w napięciu dokument o kryptowalucie w Szwajcarii: Szwajcaria i krypto rewolucja. Jak odrodzą się banki i rządy?

programme.title: Niechybny Koniec. Jak pieniądze straciły swoją wartość.
programme.desc: Wall Street jest okupowana. Europa wali się na siebie. Na całym świecie ludzie są ogarnięci strachem i gniewem, a jedno pytanie jest na ustach wszystkich: Czy kryzys finansowy się skończył, czy też zmierzamy w kierunku gospodarczej katastrofy? End of the Road to film dokumentalny, który jest kroniką globalnego krachu finansowego.

programme.title: Mafia, Kokaina i Białe Kołnierzyki

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget won't settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: International luxury realtor Mike Donia jets off to Thailand to work with a client and good friend of his, Mae. She is moving back to her hometown of Bangkok to pursue her modeling career, and is looking for the house of her dreams. Mike has his work cut out for him, as Mae's long wish list will be hard to achieve with her budget.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb and mortgage broker Paul Meredith.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey to save the day! This week's episode features the lovely couple Chris and Rosa as they search for the perfect home. While Rosa is mainly concerned with cutting down her commute, Chris just wants to feel a connection to a property. Luckily for Steve, he's got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isn't seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steve's got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jessica and Mark are a young couple living and working in Thailand after meeting there several years ago and falling in love. They are looking for a permanent home in Bangkok, and after chatting with her friend Mae, Jessica knows that Mike Donia is the man for the job.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local agents Max Gloeckner and Nala Gill, will Mike be able to find a place that suits the whole family? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. While Cheryl wants a property with minimal work and no landlord responsibilities, Martin is more open to renovations and taking on some of the commonplace duties associated with property management.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with special guest appearances by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian and guest agent Mo Loulou.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This week's episode features Cambridge realtor extraordinaire Steve Bailey as he helps couple Dan and Melinda search for the perfect home. It's a real battle of contemporary vs. traditional as Dan and Melinda hash it out over where their future lies. Melinda surprises Dan with some new information, but can Steve surprise them both by showing them the perfect property?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special guest appearance by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian.

programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vancouver-based couple Jim and Shannon are looking to relocate to their hometown of Toronto with their two daughters. With a budget of 10 million dollars, they enlist the help of savvy realtor Sofie Kehdi. While it might first seem that Jim and Shannon are on the same page, the house hunt proves that they have some differing opinions on what makes a good investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent

Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool. Daryl's listings range from King city to Caloden, with helicopter pads and sprawling backyards. Mike brings us back to his fabulous listings in Thailand. He shows us a home made entirely of Bamboo, and billion-dollar property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Suhail and Niki have busy schedules. He's a marketing director and she's a doctor so she's often on call for a hospital downtown. Can they find a place that can help relieve stress, but also be close enough to downtown for those urgent calls? They want a secluded home with at least 1 acre and magnificent views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Wendy and Daniel are looking to downsize after their kids have moved out, but still want an elegant home. She's a physical therapist and she's a business analyst. They want something that can help them relax at the end of the day, with at least 4 bedrooms and away from the downtown core. Can Lou find them something that fits?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Danielle is helping quite a pair, Joseph is a chiropractor and Nadia is an aerospace engineer. They're looking for a home to start a family. Not only that, they want space to host their extended family. Will it be as difficult as rocket science?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Janelle and Manuel are young professionals looking for more space. With one child tagging along on the tour already, they need a place for their growing family. They might need to do some renovations, but they want everything to be perfect.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: These two business owners Joseph and Heather work hard and want to play hard! They're looking for a place to entertain guests, and Daryl's got some amazing homes to show them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vipin's family of four are in the market to purchase their own dream home in the Greater Toronto Area.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Phil and Aubree, a newly wed couple, are in the market to purchase a dream home in Castlemore.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget won't settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: International luxury realtor Mike Donia jets off to Thailand to work with a client and good friend of his, Mae. She is moving back to her hometown of Bangkok to pursue her modeling career, and is looking for the house of her dreams. Mike has his work cut out for him, as Mae's long wish list will be hard to achieve with her budget.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb and mortgage broker Paul Meredith.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey to save the day! This week's episode features the lovely couple Chris and Rosa as they search for the perfect home. While Rosa is mainly concerned with cutting down her commute, Chris just wants to feel a connection to a property. Luckily for Steve, he's got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isn't seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steve's got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jessica and Mark are a young couple living and working in Thailand after meeting there several years ago and falling in love. They are looking for a permanent home in Bangkok, and after chatting with her friend Mae, Jessica knows that Mike Donia is the man for the job.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local agents Max Gloeckner and Nala Gill, will Mike be able to find a place that suits the whole family? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. While Cheryl wants a property with minimal work and no landlord responsibilities, Martin is more open to renovations and taking on some of the commonplace duties associated with property management.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with special guest appearances by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian and guest agent Mo Loulou.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This week's episode features Cambridge realtor extraordinaire Steve Bailey as he helps couple Dan and Melinda search for the perfect home. It's a real battle of contemporary vs. traditional as Dan and Melinda hash it out over where their future lies. Melinda surprises Dan with some new information, but can Steve surprise them both by showing them the perfect property?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special guest appearance by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vancouver-based couple Jim and Shannon are looking to relocate to their hometown of Toronto with their two daughters. With a budget of 10 million dollars, they enlist the help of savvy realtor Sofie Kehdi. While it might first seem that Jim and Shannon are on the same page, the house hunt proves that they have some differing opinions on what makes a good investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E18 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special appearance by guest agent Tyrone N. Steer.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E19 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.desc: Jessica and Mark are a young couple living and working in Thailand after meeting there several years ago and falling in love. They are looking for a permanent home in Bangkok, and after chatting with her friend Mae, Jessica knows that Mike Donia is the man for the job.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local agents Max Gloeckner and Nala Gill, will Mike be able to find a place that suits the whole family? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. While Cheryl wants a property with minimal work and no landlord responsibilities, Martin is more open to renovations and taking on some of the commonplace duties associated with property management.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with special guest appearances by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian and guest agent Mo Loulou.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This week's episode features Cambridge realtor extraordinaire Steve Bailey as he helps couple Dan and Melinda search for the perfect home. It's a real battle of contemporary vs. traditional as Dan and Melinda hash it out over where their future lies. Melinda surprises Dan with some new information, but can Steve surprise them both by showing them the perfect property?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special guest appearance by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vancouver-based couple Jim and Shannon are looking to relocate to their hometown of Toronto with their two daughters. With a budget of 10 million dollars, they enlist the help of savvy realtor Sofie Kehdi. While it might first seem that Jim and Shannon are on the same page, the house hunt proves that they have some differing opinions on what makes a good investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E18 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special appearance by guest agent Tyrone N. Steer.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E19 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E23 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E24 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E25 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E26 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool. Daryl's listings range from King city to Caloden, with helicopter pads and sprawling backyards. Mike brings us back to his fabulous listings in Thailand. He shows us a home made entirely of Bamboo, and billion-dollar property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.desc: A man arrested on drug warrants is upset about the BBQ brisket he left on the grill. programme.desc: A woman is placed into a restraint chair during intake. Punches are thrown and questions are asked after a fight occurs. After dodging a bar tab, a woman is also accused of spiting and biting.

programme.desc: A woman is brought in for attacking her boyfriend. A talkative inmate is moved to isolation, and an daring inmate attempts to escape his restraints.

programme.desc: An investigation involving two suspicious men in parked cars results in a foot chase and drug bust. An officer responds to a domestic call involving a threatening exhusband who is taken into custody. Officers in Florida question a deceptive and drug using couple.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police use convenience store footage to make an arrest for burglary. Police attempt to help two neighbors reconcile their differences. Officers arrest a woman for domestic violence.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E26 Not a Momma's Boy
programme.desc: Officers are called to fight between a mother and her son. Officers respond to a man on a trolley hurling racial slurs at a passenger. A traffic stop uncovers narcotics in a young man’s trunk.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers stop a man riding a bicycle in the middle of the street with no backlight. Suspects have a fun night out in a neighborhood known for drugs. Officers are dispatched to help a woman when her boyfriend threatens her with a brick.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A white-knuckled police chase ends in a dramatic escape and an unsettling officer injury. A woman spots an intoxicated prowler in a tree. Officers bring in the K-9 unit to sniff out a suspicious van.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A woman bites the arresting officer and store manager after trying to steal beer. A passenger of a suspicious vehicle attempts to hide drugs. Police respond to a call involving a knife and two women.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies detain a man when a gun falls from his pantleg. Deputies are called when a father spits on his son’s girlfriend. Officers respond when a child is bitten by two large dogs.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers are called when two intoxicated suspects decide to have some fun and vandalize a fence. Undercover officers set up a narcotics sting at a hotel. A man is found lying naked in a parking lot.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers dispatch the K-9 unit to sniff out a suspect who flees on foot. A suspicious male walking down the street is arrested with a large bag containing stolen goods and drug paraphernalia. A man is arrested in a stolen car containing drugs and a firearm.

programme.title: Ted the Train
programme.desc: Wszyscy na pokład ekspresu edukacyjnego! Ted to pociąg, który uczy dzieci o kolorach, zwierzętach, owocach, warzywach i nie tylko.

programme.title: Carl the Super Truck
programme.desc: Carl Super Truck i jego transformacje na ratunek! Gdy Samochodzikowo potrzebuje pomocy, ten superbohater wkracza do akcji.

programme.title: Construction Squad
programme.desc: Zespół budowlany buduje Samochodzikowo cegła po cegle! Pokazują, że wszystko jest możliwe z pomocą naszych przyjaciół.

programme.title: Learning with AnimaCars
programme.desc: Wheelephant uwielbia kręgle prawie tak bardzo, jak kocha liczby; co za zabawny sposób na naukę liczenia!

programme.title: Learning with AnimaCars
programme.desc: Crusty uwielbia dbać o formę tak samo, jak uwielbia liczyć, a nie ma na to lepszego miejsca niż plaża!

programme.title: Learning with AnimaCars
programme.desc: Billdozer uczy się radości z liczb z pomocą swojego przyjaciela Meagle'a, pomagając mu załadować ładunek!

programme.title: Learning with AnimaCars
programme.desc: Wheelephant i G-Crane na zmianę wrzucają popcorn do wiaderka, ucząc się przy tym liczb. Policzmy i zobaczmy, kto wygra!

programme.title: Learning with AnimaCars
programme.desc: Dołącz do Krusty'ego, aby uczyć się alfabetu i znajdować przedmioty zaczynające się na litery, które znajdzie w pobliżu.

programme.title: Learning with AnimaCars
programme.desc: Dumptrucks przemierza dżunglę w absolutnym zachwycie nad otaczającą go piękną, kolorową fauną i florą.

programme.title: Learning with AnimaCars
programme.desc: Dołączmy do G-Crane'a w zabawie w chowanego i policzmy, ilu przyjaciół znajdzie w sadzie.

programme.title: Learning with AnimaCars
programme.desc: Meagle wyrusza na poszukiwanie rzadkiego kwiatu w kropki w dżungli. Policzmy, ile ich znajdzie.

programme.title: Learning with AnimaCars
programme.desc: G-Crane jest tak kolorowy jak zawsze, a jego zadaniem jest odnalezienie jak największej liczby uśmiechniętych buziek ukrytych w dżungli.

programme.title: Learning with AnimaCars
programme.desc: Ile rzeczy można znaleźć na pustyni! Trucktle przemierza kaktusy, aby znaleźć jak najwięcej kształtów.

programme.title: Learning with AnimaCars
programme.desc: Wszędzie dookoła kryją się skarby! Zobaczmy, ile klejnotów i kształtów możemy znaleźć na plaży z Trucktle.

programme.title: Learning with AnimaCars
programme.desc: Wheelephant i Bulldozer na zmianę grają w grę "Tipper, Picker, Overs", jednocześnie ucząc się liczb, kolorów i kształtów.

programme.title: Learning with AnimaCars
programme.desc: Świat jest taki kolorowy! Nauczmy się ich wszystkich z Torchem i pomocą przyjaznego żółwia.

programme.title: Learning with AnimaCars
programme.desc: Krusty bawi się w detektywa i odkrywa tajemnicę ukrytych liczb. Pod wodospadem, za krzakami, nie ma kamienia na kamieniu!

programme.title: RoboFuse
programme.desc: Robo wraz ze swoimi lojalnymi przyjaciółmi chroni Samochodzikowo przed planami Zitrona, chcącego ukraść źródło energii miasta.

programme.desc: Classic hits from just 1 year - 1975!

programme.title: The NOW Yearbook 1978

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Fun and quirky host Chef Spencer Watts kicks off this episode by showing off his knife skills as he sabres a pineapple to start his instant classic; Grilled Fruit Salad. The pineapple joins a mix of bright summer fruits on the grill, then berries, spicy citrus vinaigrette and savoury feta cheese. Next up, Spencer whips up his Hawaiian Chicken recipe. Spiced with cayenne and Chinese five spice, Spencer stuffs flavourful chicken thighs with pineapple and grills it with a delightful ginger and soy sauce. Every bite is sweet, savoury, and fresh - exactly how summer should taste! Then Spencer shares his top tips for adding smoky flavours to pork using an easy and handy smoke pouch. His Apple...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Allium in the Family
programme.desc: Onions, green onions, chives, garlic, and leeks are all members of the same fabulous flowering family, Allium! First up? Chef Watts shows us his sweet and smoky Charred Leeks with Romesco; add grilled toast and you have your next party appetizer! Next up is a main course. Spencer starts with a juicy grilled pork chop, then adds roasted garlic melted into a balsamic onion chutney to make his out-of-this-world Roasted Garlic Pork Chops. Looking for a crowd pleaser that's easy to make? Spencer has a recipe for that! Chicken Yakitori. He threads skewers with crunchy green onions and tender chicken and caramelizes the yakitori sauce as he grills this tasty dish. Are you ready to drool? Spencer...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Have a cheese lover coming over? Blow their minds with some of Spencer's "grate" barbecued cheese recipes! First up, Spencer chars Brie Cheese to an ooey-gooey perfection and tops it with tart cherries and crunchy walnuts, serving it with crispy grilled crostinis. Next up is a Grilled Steak and Caesar with a twist only Spencer could add - grilled... lettuce! Then, Spencer uses the classic German "hasselback" presentation to stuff chicken breasts with verdant spinach, yummy Swiss cheese and pungent sun- dried tomatoes, grilling them to melty perfection. Finally, Spencer fires up his barbecue to make his Grilled Peaches with Salted Bourbon Caramel, a decadent dessert elevated with creamy...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: In this bacon loving episode, Chef Spencer delivers a tasty Bacon Weave Turkey Breast, which gets injected with beer and spices before being wrapped up in its cozy bacon blanket and sent off to the grill! Next up? A Peameal Bacon Roast with Rosti. This heavy hunk of back bacon gets smoked to flavourful perfection while Chef Watts makes the crispiest golden-fried-to-perfection potato pancake. Then, Spencer whips up a charry, grilled, super decadent, bacon-wrapped and bacon stuffed cheeseburger. Spencer isn't finished with bacon yet! For his final recipe, Spencer stuffs an apple with decadent crispy morsels stuffed along with savoury caramelized onions and melty cheddar cheese.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: This episode kicks off with Spencer's tasty Grilled Caesar Salad. He skillfully piles of char-grilled romaine lettuce wedges and sourdough croutons are topped with tangy dressing, crispy pancetta, and shards of a homemade parmesan tuile. For his next recipe, Spencer whips up Grilled Zucchini Boats that filled with fresh ingredients including orzo pasta, summer veggies, and herbs. Chef Watts loves a good steak and his Grilled Cauliflower Steak is not one to be passed up! Dusted in Middle Eastern Spices, flame roasted and served with chili-spiked, Yemeni 'Skhug' hot sauce and pomegranate seeds. Finally, Spencer steams tender artichokes, stuffing these flowers with breadcrumbs and...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: The most liked post on any grill-master's social feed is 'meat on a stick' - and Chef Spencer's Turkish-style chicken kabob is worth every click! He marinates thick juicy chicken morsels in yogurt and spices, and then grills these flavourful skewers to a charry perfection. Next up is the creative 'Tornado Potato' which re- invents grilled potatoes with a wild presentation and a trio of toppings. Spencer then assembles Char Siu Sliders on tiny party- ready buns. Stuffed with a soy, honey and umami-packed hoisin lacquered slow-and-low grilled pork belly, these tasty little sliders will have your taste buds tingling. For his final recipe, Spencer whips up toasted crispy roti cups; topping...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Chef Spencer starts this spicy barbeque episode with flavours from Thailand with a Bok Choy with a Ginger Chili Sauce. Powerful bird's eye chilies are packed into a sweet and spicy sauce and served over tasty grilled bok choy. Spencer then introduces us to Calabrian chilies, mashed into a spice paste and rubbed on butterflied chicken that then gets grilled to flame-kissed perfection. Next, Spencer gives fresh calamari some heat with Korean chilies that add their distinctive heat and flavour before grilling this scrumptious recipe and serving it over a comforting bed of rice and peas. Finally, Spencer prepares Seekh Kabobs, made with ground lamb spiked with punchy dried Kashmiri chilies...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: First stop on Chef Spencer's Spanish flavour tour? Habanero Char-Grilled Octopus - warmed up with punchy chilies and balanced with a sweet and tangy sherry vinaigrette. Next, Spencer stuffs whole sea bass with citrus and herbs, gives it the grill treatment and then tops it with olive oil blistered cherry tomatoes. The rotisserie does the heavy lifting for Mr. Watts' whole roast chicken - spiked with bright Spanish flavours like Spanish chilies and smoked paprika, slow cooked and served extra juicy. Finally, Spencer prepares a classic Spanish recipe: Paella. Loaded saffron rice, piled high with chorizo, veggies, and shellfish. Of course, Spencer's Paella is made in the Spanish tradition;...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 The Butter Did It
programme.desc: It's all about beautiful butter in this episode of Watts on the Grill! First up, entertaining host Spencer fires tosses clams in velvety butter, zesty garlic and earthy spices to make his Clams with Garlic Paprika Butter. Next up is a traditional Indian recipe, but done on the grill - Butter Chicken! All the butter chicken flavours we love are infused in the marinade, before getting crisped up on the fiery grill - the result is both classic and completely new! Scallops are next, grilled and served with a mouth-watering caper-raisin butter. For his final recipe; Chef Watts prepares a rich and juicy grilled Rib Steak topped with a decadent port wine compound butter. Oh, what a butter-loving...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: We've all cooked with salt. But what about ON salt. That's right, chef Spencer Watts blows our minds with his seared scallops that are cooked on a Himalayan pink salt block. His next recipe uses a quick cure with Hawaiian black lava salt on swordfish steaks, then tops them with a gorgeous and refreshing grilled fruit salsa. Then, Spencer gets creative with Cured Duck Legs with Scallions, using a salt cure to intensify the flavours of duck leg before it's cooked slow and low, then glazed with maple and soy. After cooking on salt, curing with salt, the only thing left is to cook INSIDE salt - Spencer's Salt Crusted Prime Rib is a game changer, flavourful, bone-in beef that he seasons with a...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Chocolate on the barbecue? That's right. Chef Spencer Watts kicks off this episode as he grills a crispy coconut-cacao crust and serves it with sweet chili dipping sauce. Chocolate is the not-so-secret ingredient in Spencer's Grilled Chicken Molé. He grills the chicken legs smothered in the sweet-spicy-salty-nutty-creamy-chocolatey sauce, then finishes it by cooking it slow and low. Next, dark chocolate cocoa powder is in both the rub and the sauce for Chef Watts' favourite pork rib recipe - Cocoa-rubbed Baby Back Ribs. For his final recipe, Spencer takes it to a sweet level with his Chocolate pizza made with chocolate ganache, grilled cherries, with barbeque- caramelized white chocolate...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 The Art of Wood
programme.desc: It's time to celebrate the art of smoking with wood! You'll drool over Spencer's Cherrywood Smoked Chicken Wings, dry rubbed with his favourite spices and smoked with cherrywood. Next, Spencer marinates sable fish in Japanese ingredients and grills it on a sweet-smoky cedar plank. Then, Spencer shows off his Texas BBQ skills with his Mesquite Smoked Skirt Steak. Engulfed in a thick cloud of white smoke, this skirt steak has the flavour and texture of tasty brisket, but made in a fraction amount of time. Finally, Spencer gives a pork shoulder a long, smoky cook in oak wood. The wait is worth it as he serves it piled high on a bun and topped with a mustardy Carolina BBQ sauce.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob is having a Costume Party he's bravely entrusted his buddy Jim to pick out their outfits. With a menu of slow smoked Thai ribs, cinnamon chicken and snapper in parchment paper, Rob's skill at the grill is unmasked

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: It's time for Rob's long awaited pool party. His friends sun by the pool, while Rob makes a splash at the grill with turkey burgers, slow smoked beef ribs, roasted tomato salad and grilled chicken with spicy pine nut crust.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Hold your Horse"...shoes! Rob hosts his annual Horseshoe BBQ tournament, and grills up a southern feast. He and his ring of friends devour delicious smoked rotisserie pig, lemon ginger chicken drumsticks and roasted peppers stuffed with corn.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob is born to be wild - Hog Wild that is! Rob and his motorcycle riding friends cruise the streets for charity then head back to Rob's for the post parade party. The hungry bikers don't rebel when he serves up a picnic pork roast, funky potato packages, tamarind shrimp, plus sauces and sides galore.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: On your mark, get set, grill! Rob hosts an Olympic celebration and serves up a gold medal meal of stuffed veal chops, smoked leg of lamb, grilled pesto peppers and a cool summer salad.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob and his friends catch a wave of good times and good food at his Surf & Turf BBQ. They feast of crab legs, roasted leg of lamb, a bucket of clams and the biggest thickest steak you ever did see!

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Going once, going twice, gone. Rob and his friends are donating their special keepsakes to a Silent Auction to raise money for charity. They head over to Robs for a quick and delicious pre-auction chowdown that includes lemon pepper Cornish Hens, sweet monkfish, chili lime shrimp and stuffed pork tenderloin.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob likes to Rock and Roll all night and BBQ every Saturday. This time he rocks out with his buddy Jim's Band "Giver". While they belt out the tunes, Rob creates his own hits with grilled lamb chops, crispy potato skins, beef brisket and smoked Proscuitto wrapped shrimp.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Ole! Rob serves up a Spanish Tapas BBQ that includes spicy lamb ribs, beef tenderloin, blackened scallops, proscuitto wrapped figs stuffed with blue cheese and gazpacho vodka in cucumber cups. The portions are small, but the taste is huge! And that's no bull.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob likes clowning around, but he is the Ringmaster of his own Carnival Day BBQ. After a fun day at the fair, Rob keeps the party going with a fairground finger food like pizza burgers, homemade pogos, pork ribs and cool iced tea.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob and his friends are hitting the bike trails. After a long bike ride, Rob grills up a high protein meal of veal ribs, steelhead trout, southwestern black bean salad and pistachio and honey crusted lamb racks.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: The liquor cabinet is getting too full so Rob is throwing a Boozy BBQ with the left over spirits from parties past. He pulls together a feast of tequila chicken breasts, white wine veal chops, martini and grilled tarragon mushrooms.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Collard Greens, Maple Syrup, Goat Cheddar and Heirloom Cherry Tomatoes
programme.desc: Host Amanda Herrera prepares a frittata, rosemary skewer chicken and grilled bread salad with fresh ingredients from a local farmers' market.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Broccoli, Rainbow Chard and Herbs
programme.desc: Warm host Amanda Herrera picks up colourful produce and herbs at a farmers' market to make a delicious appetizer and tasty cold oil French fries.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Honeycomb, Shallots and Iceberg Lettuce
programme.desc: Host Amanda Herrera transforms fresh market ingredients into two irresistible dishes, including a one pot Lamb Curry with Honeycomb.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Patty Pan Summer Squash and Cabbage
programme.desc: Host Amanda Herrera grills up two dinner recipes using patty pan summer squash and cabbage that she picked up from the market.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Beans, Raspberry Jam and Relish
programme.desc: On today's Fresh Market Dinners menu, host Amanda Herrera prepares succulent burgers with golden fries and a refreshing cocktail.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Cream, Sunflower Oil and Cherry Tomatoes
programme.desc: Using cream, sunflower oil and cherry tomatoes from the market, host Amanda Herrera makes an irresistible pasta recipe and indulgent dessert.

programme.title: Cook Like a Chef
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Beef Episode with Chef Ned Bell
programme.desc: The perfect steak is a beautiful thing. Chef Ned Bell works with various cuts of beef and demonstrates the techniques used to create mouth-watering carnivorous dishes.

programme.title: MORE One Big Recipe
programme.desc: Re-join Chef Kimberly Lallouz in her One Big Recipe test kitchen as she masterfully creates a week night feast of Vietnamese style clams, braised greens, balsamic Cipollini onions, pork chops with grilled peaches, and avocado cake with avocado frosting.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Not only do the racers in the Soap Box Derby have a need for speed, they have a need for BBQ! Matt and the RG team cook up a feast to slow down any speedster. The menu: Smoked Shrimp B.L.T., Pineapple Basil Rotisserie Chicken, Grilled Sweet Potato Pops, and Summer Berry Pudding.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Day By the Water
programme.desc: Matt spends the day by the water; fishing, playing Frisbee, catching some rays. What goes with water and sun? BBQ!!! Matt & his team make a seafood buffet of Grilled Clams in the Shell with Serrano Ham, Smoked Lake Rainbow Trout, Grilled Lobster with Grapefruit Salsa, and Crab-Stuffed Avocados.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt gets down and dirty playing some beach Volleyball. In between bumps, sets, and spikes, the RG team serves up a smorgasbord of great food. The menu: Grilled Chicken Breast on Foccacia with Grilled Apples & Cambozola Cheese, Sezchuan Ribs with Chunky Plum Dipping Sauce, Roasted Corn and Pepper Potato Salad, and Homemade Protein Bars

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Forget bicycle built for two. This Big Bike fits 30 people! Matt & the team join forces with the Heart & Stroke foundation to raise money by riding around a track. Matt feeds these 'bikers' some healthy and delicious grub. The menu: Grilled Calamari, Smoked Turkey Fajitas, Grilled Scallops and Watermelon Salsa, and Cold Gazpacho.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: It's a bird, it's a plane, it's a day of great BBQ. Inspired by the aerial acrobatics of CF18's and Harvards, Matt cooks up a variety of poultry and fowl. The menu: Bacon Wrapped Quail Stuffed with 3 Cream Cheeses, Raspberry Chipotle Turkey Wings, Grilled Balsamic Marinated Duck Breast, and Deviled Eggs.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Whether you're a pro or a beginner, everyone is welcome to join the Road Grill team at the 19th tee where Matt is busy burnin' up his Q's. What better way to end your day at the links with an enticing menu of Miso Citrus Grilled Sablefish, Smoked Rack of Pork with a Sour Cherry Sauce , Lemon Basil Smashed Potatoes with Mushrooms, Arugula Salad with Peaches, and Blue Cheese and Walnuts.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: In between hoisting sails and scrubbing the deck, Matt and his team prepare a feast for the sailors before going on a long voyage. Not only is the weather perfect for sailing, it's perfect for BBQing! The menu: Scallop Corn Bacon Burger, Maple-apple Brined Pork Chops, Grilled Tuna Bruschetta, and Strawberry Marscapone Trifle.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Teddy Bears of all age, shape, and size join our grill team with their owners for a day of games, rides and some teddy bear repair. Matt & the RG team are BBQing a menu even the pickiest eater will love. The menu: Grilled Almond Butter & Banana Sandwiches, Grilled Meatball Sub, Smoked White Cheddar Macaroni, and Quick & Snappy Ginger Lemon Ice Cream Sandwiches.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Llamas, horses, and pigs...Oh My! The RG team lends it support to a farm animal rescue. Matt sets up his grills during a weekend fundraiser and stays friendly to his animal buddies by serving up a vegetarian menu. The menu: Portobello Burger Stack, Smoked Corn Tamale with Goat Cheese& Salsa Fresca, Pizza Salad Sandwich, and Tabbouleh Salad

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Day at the Pool
programme.desc: The neighbourhood outdoor pool is a great way to cool down on a hot summer day. Matt and the Grill Team are dipping their feet in the pool, splashing with the kids, and, of course, grilling up some fabulous eats to munch on while playing in the park or relaxing on your towel. The menu: BBQ'd Pork Tenderloin & Pears on Bagels, Grilled Asian Chicken Burger, Surf & Turf Kabobs with Arugula Pesto, and BBQ'd Cinnamon Donuts.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: It's graduation day at Chef School and Matt and the Grill team are sharing in the festivities. To congratulate the new Chefs, Matt has cooked up a masterful menu of fancy, yet simple, dishes. The menu: Mixed Seafood Grill on a Plank, Maple Rosemary Rotisserie Chicken, Dunked Hunan Lamb Rack, and Salmon Pastrami.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: The Road Grill team goes rural and gets lost in hedge mazes at Saunders Farm. Luckily, they find their way out in time to cook up some BBQ and feed all families at the farm. The menu: Grilled Chicken Legs with Crunchy Chip Crust, Smoked Ham with Maple Mustard Glaze, Planked Asparagus Bundles with Cheese and Prosciutto, and Cobb Salad.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt Dunigan hits the soccer field at a local youth soccer tournament. After some fancy footwork he leaves the field and hits the grill to cook up some Slo-Smoked Saucy Ribs, some Cheesy Bacon Potato Skins, and Chicken on a stick with Home Made Plum Sauce

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Road Grill Team BBQ into the night at a small town country fair. Lamb Souvlaki pita with a Tzatziki Sauce, Slo-Smoked Brisket, Bacon Wrapped Grilled Corn and Caramel Kettle Corn are serious competition for the midway.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and his BBQ team hit the soft sand under the hot summer sun and treat the beach lovers to some great food that can be eaten on the go - Blackened Scallops with Avocado Salsa, Slo-Smoked Beef Ribs, Flank Steak Fajitas, and Watermelon Salad.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt, Karrie, Jenna and Charlotte are 'Team Road Grill' at a fundraiser ball hockey tournament. They fire it up and serve the players Grilled Lamb Chops with Mint Pesto sauce, Slap shot Smoked Chicken, Power Play Crab cakes, and a Pear and Fennel Salad.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Team "drop in" on a group of thrill seeking skydivers at a Skydiving Jamboree. They let the BBQs rip and grill up three different kinds of wings - smoked, jerked and 'suicide hot'. Then they cool things down with an asparagus cucumber salad.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Road Grill Team put the pedal to the metal at the Go Kart Track. They crank up the heat on the grills and pull out all the stops making Summertime Pizza, Sticky BBQ Chicken, Smoked Turkey Pastrami Sandwiches and a Summer Mellon Ball Salad.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Team to cook up a midsummer feast. Leg of Lamb with Summer Herbs, Rosemary Grilled Pork Tenderloin with Wild Berry Sauce, Grilled Trout with Peaches, and a Tomato Salad have the locals raiding the market to stay stocked on the season's best.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Road Grill Team spend the day playing around the Water Park. The Spit Roasted Lemon-Lime Butter Chicken, Grilled Swordfish Skewers with Caribbean Salsa, and Smokey Spareribs with BBQ Sauce result in a big splash with this pool loving crowd.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Road Grill team grill up a feast for some hungry athletes at the Ultimate Frisbee Tournament. Jumbo shrimp with a rosemary dry rub, Slo-smoked Pork Butt in a Papaya Marinade, and Asian Pasta Salad have the athletes asking for more.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: The Antique Steam train is in town! Matt and the team give the crowd something to chew-chew on with delicious Grilled Vegetable Quesadillas, Honey Mustard Chicken Drumsticks, Grilled Turkey Burgers with Pineapple Salsa, and Grilled Corn with Orange Butter

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: The Road Grill team follows him to the baseball diamond and together they treat the ball players to two kinds of mini burgers, some triple play stuffed veal, Mushroom Fricassee on a baguette, and Homerun Mixed Smoked Nuts.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Road Grill team lend a hand at a Habitat for Humanity building site to feed hungry volunteers. Matt and the team make some delicious Brick Chicken, some Maple Wood Planked Pork, Steak Sandwiches, and Blue Cheese and Bacon Potato Salad.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Pork was Made for Barbeques
programme.desc: Pork and the grill are good buddies and host Spencer Watts shows us four of his favourite pork recipes that will have you salivating.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Barbecuing bananas, that's crazy. Chef Spencer Watts shows us how to grill the delicate, evERS-scrumptious fruit. Bananas.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Fish on the Grill
programme.desc: Fish. Flaky, flavoursome, and perfect for barbeque. High energy host Spencer Watts tests out his grill with delightfully tender fish dishes.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Shellfish is delicate, tantalizing, and full of flavour, especially when it's grilled to perfection

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Barbeque is all about sauces, rubs and marinades

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Salsa that will Dance on Your Tongue
programme.desc: Salsa means undeniable flavour! Lively host Spencer Watts plays with sweet, salty, and spicy in four amazing salsa recipes.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Grilling expert Spencer Watts hosts a tasty beef-a-palooza with four incredible beef cuts including smoked brisket and succulent beef tenderloin.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Barbeque isn’t Just for Meat
programme.desc: Barbeque is not just about meat! Chef Spencer Watts shows us how to grill fruits and vegetables like a pro.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Grilled, Roasted & Charred Chicken
programme.desc: Charismatic host Spencer Watts shows us why chicken is best on the grill with four irresistible chicken recipes.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: There are limitless options with lamb on the grill! Host Spencer Watts offers some tips and tricks on how to prepare four different cuts of lamb.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Whether for a small family dinner or a big backyard barbeque, host Spencer Watts shows us the best ways to grill up tasty duck, turkey, capon, and quail.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Sides & Sweets with Heat
programme.desc: Never underestimate the power of a good side or dessert! Fun host Spencer Watts grills up the perfect sides and treats for your next barbeque.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob is having a Costume Party he's bravely entrusted his buddy Jim to pick out their outfits. With a menu of slow smoked Thai ribs, cinnamon chicken and snapper in parchment paper, Rob's skill at the grill is unmasked

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: It's time for Rob's long awaited pool party. His friends sun by the pool, while Rob makes a splash at the grill with turkey burgers, slow smoked beef ribs, roasted tomato salad and grilled chicken with spicy pine nut crust.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Hold your Horse"...shoes! Rob hosts his annual Horseshoe BBQ tournament, and grills up a southern feast. He and his ring of friends devour delicious smoked rotisserie pig, lemon ginger chicken drumsticks and roasted peppers stuffed with corn.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob is born to be wild - Hog Wild that is! Rob and his motorcycle riding friends cruise the streets for charity then head back to Rob's for the post parade party. The hungry bikers don't rebel when he serves up a picnic pork roast, funky potato packages, tamarind shrimp, plus sauces and sides galore.

It has more turtle visitors than humans!

programme.desc: Indeya Passfield seeks local Maldivian experiences in Hadahaa, where she learns about the ecosystem, local traditions and cuisine.

programme.title: Xplore Belgium
programme.desc: Brussels is one of the most cosmopolitan cities of Belgium and also its economic and political center. There are way too many things to do here.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 World Spas Fusion Maia, Vietnam
programme.desc: Travel to Da Nang this week with World Spas and take a peek into the life of the pampered few.
